description: The classic dessert gets a modern makeover. This Rum and raisin pudding recipe is cooked in a slow cooker. The results will amaze you.
name: Slow Cooker Rum & Raisin Pudding Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 350g white sandwich bread, cut into 3cm cubes

recipeInstructions.text: Grease bowl of a 5.5L slow cooker. Add bread and raisins, then toss to combine.

Whisk eggs, cream, milk and rum together in a large bowl. Pour cream mixture over bread mixture. Sprinkle over cinnamon. Place a clean tea towel over top of bowl, then secure with lid and cook on low for 4 hours.
Stand pudding for 15 minutes, then serve topped with ice-cream.
